Nudestix Gentle Hydra Gel Face Cleanser

Brand: Nudestix

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, PEG-6 CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC GLYCERIDES, GLYCERIN, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, POLYGLYCERYL-4 CAPRATE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, CARBOMER, PROPANEDIOL, TROMETHAMINE, PEG-60 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, CITRUS AURANTIUM BERGAMIA (B

URANTIUM BERGAMIA (BERGAMOT) FRUIT OIL, TRICHOLOMA MATSUTAKE EXTRACT, TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE, HYDROLYZED CICER SEED EXTRACT, RHODODENDRON CHRYSANTHUM LEAF EXTRACT, HYALURONIC ACID, HYDROLYZED HYALURONIC ACID, SODIUM HYALURONATE, TOCOPHEROL, *LIMONENE, *LINALOOL

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Im
ncer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
